snippet: Two of the authors of the welfare reform law say work requirements should not be waived.
abstract: Letter from Rep Dave Camp, Republican of Michigan, and former Rep Clay Shaw, Republican of Florida, responds to August 9 editorial asserting that Mitt Romney's criticism of Pres Obama for ending federal work requirements for welfare recipients is false and divisive.
lead_paragraph: Two of the authors of the welfare reform law say work requirements should not be waived.
